thread.title: Omantel launches Ethernet service for its corporate and business customers
thread.title_full: Omantel launches Ethernet service for its corporate and business customers | MENAFN.COM

author: Muscat Daily
title: Omantel launches Ethernet service for its corporate and business customers
text: (MENAFN - Muscat Daily) Muscat- In line with its commitment to enrich its customers with innovative services that add value to their businesses Omantel the leading telecommunication services provider in the sultanate announced the launch of Ethernet service for corporate customers. Commenting on the launch of the Ethernet service Ali Bakhit Kashoob senior manager Product Development at Omantel's Corporate Business Unit said 'The Ethernet service is an innovate service which allows corporate customers and public organisations to connect two or more sites or branches through a LAN network to smoothly transmit data and applications allowing for site-to-site connectivity easily securely and cost-effectively helping to boost the overall business performance.' He added that Omantel is very keen on introducing modern technologies and services that add value to its customers. The services will also contribute to enhancing productivity and improving the services rendered by these organisations to their customers and beneficiaries. 'Ethernet services allows our customers to manage their data transfer among different branches through a virtual connectivity. The service provides dedicated capacities for use at a fixed speed to enable customers to control their costs; an objective that was well considered by Omantel when designing this service. 'The Ethernet service allows our customers to be in better control of the network. They can add sites change speeds if required and set the priorities for certain applications. 'This service offers several options from which they can select the best services available to them. The company provides this service with CPE modem that will be fixed at each site of the client premises.' Omantel Business Unit provides advanced communication solutions that meet the needs of the different public and private customers. These services enables customers to remain connected with their customers as well as local and foreign partners. The MPLS by Omantel is the first service that gets the ISO certification. Omantel provides its services to governmental organisations as well as business community through experienced account managers. Omantel has been voted by Brand Finance as the most valuable brand in the sultanate for the fifth consecutive year as well as the most trusted brand in telecom sectorin Oman as revealed by Oman Economic Review brand survey.
